attacks.name: Bubble Beam
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Fairy Power
attacks.text: Return 1 of your Pokémon and all cards attached to it to your hand.

attacks.name: Hyper Beam
attacks.text: Discard an Energy card attached to the Defending Pokémon.

attacks.name: Close Combat
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done to Hitmontop by attacks is increased by 20 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Triple Kick
attacks.text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Mass Attack
attacks.text: Does 10 damage times the number of Pokémon in play (both yours and your opponent's).

attacks.name: Leaf Guard
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done to Jumpluff by attacks is reduced by 30 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

ability.name: Roast Reveal
ability.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may discard a {R} Energy card from your hand. If you do, draw 3 cards. This power can't be used if Ninetales is affected by a Special Condition.

ability.name: Night Sight
ability.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may draw a card. This power can't be used if Noctowl is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Extrasensory
attacks.text: If you have the same number of cards in your hand as your opponent, this attack does 40 damage plus 40 more damage.

attacks.name: Muddy Water
attacks.text: Does 20 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Iron Tail
attacks.text: Flip a coin until you get tails. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Thunderbolt
attacks.text: Discard all Energy attached to Raichu.

ability.name: Shell Barricade
ability.text: As long as Shuckle is on your Bench, prevent all damage done to Shuckle by attacks (both yours and your opponent's).

attacks.name: Poison Jab
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned.

ability.name: Second Sight
ability.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may look at the top 3 cards of either player's deck and put them back on top of that player's deck in any order. This power can't be used if Slowking is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Psyshock
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Double Return
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 damage times the number of damage counters on Wobbuffet.

attacks.name: Thunder
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, Ampharos does 20 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Acceleration Bolt
attacks.text: Search your deck for up to 2 basic Energy cards and attach them to 1 of your Pokémon. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Leech Life
attacks.text: Remove from Ariados the number of damage counters equal to the damage you did to the Defending Pokémon.

attacks.name: Poisonous Saliva
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned.

attacks.name: Cure Powder
attacks.text: Remove 3 damage counters from each of your Pokémon.

attacks.name: Whirlwind
attacks.text: Your opponent switches the Defending Pokémon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokémon.

ability.name: Sweet Sleeping Face
ability.text: As long as Cleffa is Asleep, prevent all damage done to Cleffa by attacks.

attacks.name: Eeeeeeek

attacks.name: Big Eggsplosion
attacks.text: Flip a coin for each Energy attached to Exeggutor. This attack does 40 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Energy Absorption

attacks.text: This attack does 20 damage to each of your opponent's Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 damage plus 20 more damage.

attacks.name: Chomp
attacks.text: Does 40 damage plus 10 more damage for each damage counter on Granbull.

ability.name: Sleep Pendulum
ability.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Asleep. This power can't be used if Hypno is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.text: Does 10 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Sleep Powder
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon is now Asleep.

attacks.name: Sharpen Claws
attacks.text: Flip 3 coins. For each heads, discard a card from your opponent's hand without looking.

attacks.name: Sneaky Attack

ability.name: Sweet Sleeping Face
ability.text: As long as Pichu is Asleep, prevent all damage done to Pichu by attacks.

attacks.name: Playground
attacks.text: Each player may search his or her deck for as many Basic Pokémon as he or she likes, put them onto his or her Bench, and shuffle his or her deck afterward. (You put your Pokémon on the Bench first.) Pichu is now Asleep.

attacks.name: Fury Swipes
attacks.text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned.

attacks.name: Energy Antics
attacks.text: Move an Energy card attached to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon to another of your opponent's Pokémon. Smoochum is now Asleep.

ability.name: Sunshine Grace
ability.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may search your deck for a {G} Pokémon, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward. This power can't be used if Sunflora is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.text: Draw a card for each {W} Energy attached to all of your Pokémon.

attacks.text: This attack does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.text: Igglybuff is now Asleep. During your opponent's next turn, the attack cost of each of the Defending Pokémon's attacks is {C} more.

attacks.text: Search your deck for a {W} Pokémon, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 damage plus 10 more damage.

attacks.name: Big Yawn
attacks.text: Both Slowbro and the Defending Pokémon are now Asleep.

attacks.text: Does 30 damage plus 20 more damage for each {P} Energy attached to Slowbro.

attacks.name: Cosmic Cyclone
attacks.text: Choose as many {W} Energy attached to your Pokémon as you like. This attack does 20 damage times the amount of Energy you chose. Shuffle those cards back into your deck.

ability.name: Return
ability.text: Once during your turn, when you put Unown from your hand onto your Bench, you may return all Energy attached to 1 of your Pokémon to your hand.

ability.text: Once during your turn, when you put Unown from your hand onto your Bench, you may look at the top 5 cards of your deck and put them back on top of your deck in any order.

attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.text: Flip 4 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

attacks.text: Your opponent switches the Defending Pokémon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokémon.

attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Cure Kernels
attacks.text: Remove 2 damage counters from 1 of your Pokémon.

attacks.name: Ember
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, discard a {R} Energy attached to Vulpix.

attacks.name: Singe
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Burned.

attacks.name: Tail Whip
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon can't attack during your opponent's next turn.

name: Copycat
text: Shuffle your hand into your deck. Then, draw a number of cards equal to the number of cards in your opponent's hand.

name: Energy Switch
text: Move a basic Energy card attached to 1 of your Pokémon to another of your Pokémon.

name: Fisherman
text: Search your discard pile for 4 basic Energy cards, show them to your opponent, and put them into your hand.

name: Full Heal
text: Remove all Special Conditions from your Active Pokémon.

name: Moomoo Milk
text: Choose 1 of your Pokémon. Flip 2 coins. For each heads, remove 3 damage counters from that Pokémon.

name: Poké Ball
text: Flip a coin. If heads, search your deck for a Pokémon, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

name: Pokégear3.0
text: Look at the top 7 cards of your deck. Choose a Supporter card you find there, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle the other cards back into your deck.

name: Pokémon Collector
text: Search your deck for up to 3 Basic Pokémon, show them to your opponent, and put them into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

name: Pokémon Communication
text: Choose 1 Pokémon in your hand, show it to your opponent, and put it on top of your deck. If you do, search your deck for a Pokémon, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

name: Pokémon Reversal
text: Flip a coin. If heads, choose 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon and switch it with your opponent's Active Pokémon.

name: Professor Elm's Training Method
text: Search your deck for an Evolution card, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

name: Professor Oak's New Theory
text: Shuffle your hand into your deck. Then, draw 6 cards.

name: Switch
text: Switch 1 of your Active Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

name: Rainbow Energy
text: Attach Rainbow Energy to 1 of your Pokémon. While in play, Rainbow Energy provides every type of Energy but provides only 1 Energy at a time. (Has no effect other than providing Energy.) When you attach this card from your hand to 1 of your Pokémon, put 1 damage counter on that Pokémon. (While not in play, Rainbow Energy counts as {C} Energy.)

ability.name: Conductivity
ability.text: Whenever your opponent attaches an Energy card from his or her hand to 1 of his or her Pokémon, put 1 damage counter on that Pokémon.

attacks.name: Lightning Crush
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 40 damage plus 40 more damage. If tails, discard an Energy attached to the Defending Pokémon.

ability.name: Blissful Nurse
ability.text: Once during your turn, when you play Blissey from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon, you may remove all damage counters from all of your Pokémon. If you do, discard all Energy attached to those Pokémon that had any damage counters on them.

ability.name: Exoskeleton
ability.text: Any damage done to Donphan by attacks is reduced by 20 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Earthquake
attacks.text: Does 10 damage to each of your Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

ability.name: Rain Dance
ability.text: As often as you like during your turn (before your attack), you may attach a {W} Energy card from your hand to 1 of your {W} Pokémon. This power can't be used if Feraligatr is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Hydro Crunch
attacks.text: Does 60 damage plus 10 more damage for each damage counter on the Defending Pokémon.

ability.name: Leaf Trans
ability.text: As often as you like during your turn (before your attack), you may move a {G} Energy attached to 1 of your Pokémon to another of your Pokémon. This power can't be used if Meganium is affected by a Special Condition.

ability.name: Afterburner
ability.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may search your discard pile for a {R} Energy card and attach it to 1 of your Pokémon. If you do, put 1 damage counter on that Pokémon. This power can't be used if Typhlosion is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Flare Destroy
attacks.text: Discard an Energy card attached to Typhlosion and discard an Energy card attached to the Defending Pokémon.

attacks.name: Thrash
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 damage plus 20 more damage. If tails, Gyarados does 20 damage to itself.
